verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:26
verses.text: As for Elkanah: the sons of Elkanah; Zophai his son, and Nahath his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:27
verses.text: Eliab his son, Jeroham his son, Elkanah his son.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:28
verses.text: And the sons of Samuel; the firstborn Vashni, and Abiah.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:29
verses.text: The sons of Merari; Mahli, Libni his son, Shimei his son, Uzza his son,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:30
verses.text: Shimea his son, Haggiah his son, Asaiah his son.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:31
verses.text: And these are they whom David set over the service of song in the house of the Lord, after that the ark had rest.
